item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello! This is my Tech blog, where I am to write about techy things. To follow tradition I will be writing hello world in various languages I am competent in. One day I hope to add more languages. Python1 print("Hello World") Go1 2 3 4 5 import fmt package main func main() { fmt.Println("Hello World") } Bash1 echo "Hello World" Powershell1 Write-Host "Hello World" C++1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <iostream> int main() { std::cout << "Hello World!
